flawed_nl_solution:
When he gave 40 seashells to his friends, Ali had 180-40= <<180-40=104>>104 seashells.
When he gave another 30 seashells to his brothers, he had 104-30 = <<104-30=74>>74 seashells
He also sold half of the seashells, a total of 1/2*74 = <<37=37>>37 seashells
He was left with 74-37= <<74-37=37>>37 seashells

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 140, not 104. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
